attributes.action: Change the town name of 'Trent Vale' to 'Trent Vegas' in Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Trent Vale has long been known by locals as Trent Vegas because of its characteristic long stretch of road lined with retail. This change could only be of benefit to the local community by this simple regeneration.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
